I think the government needs to create a TV advert to be aired on all channels about the facts of ebola and how it is transmitted.

There is too much scaremongering from the press, publishing inaccurate information. Readers comments that are being left on the web pages of the articles goes to show that people are terrified or are criticising what people are doing, simply due to them only knowing what they have read from inaccurate reports
